Subseries II.D. Television and Radio Transcript Files
Subseries II.D. Television and Radio Transcript Files

The Radio and Television Transcript files cover the period of 1990 to 1991 and include transcripts from Fortune editors' appearances on radio and television programs. The specific shows included in this subseries are Inside Business and Your Dollar. Additionally, there are transcripts from editor appearances on the Financial News Network.
